reloader_ability.description: Assisted reload ability to play on the reloader.

reloadee_ability.description: Assisted reload ability to play on the reloadee.

interpolation_speed_aim.description: Interpoaltion speed of the aim position while being reloaded

interpolation_speed_firing.description: Interpoaltion speed of the aim position while being reloaded

requires_clearing.description: [bool]IIf set, the megazine/rounds (except for the chambered round) will be cleared before reloading.

reload_amount.description: Number of rounds to reload per assisted reload (only used for projectile weapons).

reload_cost.description: Cost applied to the backpack debosit component for a reload on this weapon.

attach_offset.description: Offset relative to the root of the reloadee to attach the reloader, in the root's coordinate system after applying the rotation offset.

attach_rotation.description: Rotation in degrees relative to the root of the reloadee to attach the reloader.

reloader_idle_animation_event.description: [string]Animation event to trigger on the reloader when entering

attach_offset_crouch.description: When crouched, offset relative to the root of the reloadee to attach the reloader, in the root's coordinate system after applying the rotation offset.

attach_rotation_crouch.description: When crouched, rotation in degrees relative to the root of the reloadee to attach the reloader.

attach_offset_prone.description: When proning, offset relative to the root of the reloadee to attach the reloader, in the root's coordinate system after applying the rotation offset.

attach_rotation_prone.description: When proning, rotation in degrees relative to the root of the reloadee to attach the reloader.
